Empty Arcade Machines Make for Poor Decor

Wed, 04/01/2009 - 01:28 | by Jesse

A few months ago, my friend Tokle and I visited an arcade warehouse down the street from our office after work. As he was checking out the pinball tables, I fell in love with a custom Multicade machine that they had set up. The only problem was that it cost over $3,000.

Tue, 03/31/2009 - 20:09 | by Jesse

The end of March is here. I'm still scrambling with what to do for next month, but right now it's between taking Pilates classes with Perri, riding my bicycle to work every day, or not eating out all month. I'm headed to the laundromat in a few minutes though and should have an hour or two to mull it over.
